captureMode.infoTxt:
Capture mode defines how the image data will be taken with a priority given to either resolution or frame rate.

Note: The Capture mode is intended to be set the first time the camera is configured. If changed later, some settings will be either removed or reset.
captureMode.infoAltTxt:
Select capture mode with respect to the power line frequency (50 Hz or 60 Hz) used at the location of the camera. This will reduce image flicker in fluorescent environments.

Note: The Capture mode is intended to be set the first time the camera is configured. If changed later, some settings will be either removed or reset.
